Description:
Fantastic Kennington Location with ready made Tenant
Offering a nice size seperate backyard with plenty of room to relax in, this unit will appeal to those who either want to invest or vacant possession can be arranged if required. Features 2 bedrooms with BIR's, light bright kitchen-meals-living area & seperate laundry & bathroom. Single carport. Fantastic current tenant who would love to stay on. Current rent $160.00pw. Situated within walking distance to the University or to town. This unit is a great investment for your future.
Kaye Lazenby : 0407 843 167

Description:
Great Location At The Right Price
This affordable quality three bedroom brick veneer home is located in one of Bendigos most sought after areas. Just a couple of blocks from Strath village and only a short drive to central Bendigo. The home features two living areas, 3 spacious bedrooms (2 of which have BIRs) and gas heating. The kitchen has gas cooking and an adjoining meals area. Three piece bathroom and a lovely sitting/sun room. Established gardens outside as well as a single lock up garage. Schools, public transport and university are also of close proximity. Great for the first home buyers, young families, retirees or an excellent investment property. Early inspection is recommended.

Description:
When Location Is Everything
This tastefully renovated home is situated in a fantastic location walking distance to the CBD. Comprising Three bedrooms, Main with BIRs. Polished floors throughout the living areas which include spacious lounge room and dining area. New kitchen with breakfast bar, dishwasher, gas stove top and under-bench oven with glass splash back. Renovated light-filled bathroom with shower over bath and toilet. Ducted gas heating and ducted evaporative cooling. Outside there is a rear deck plus a paved entertaining area amongst landscaped gardens. Double garage. If you want a home with character in a central location then dont miss this opportunity.

Description:
ENVIABLE LOCATION
Located in the centre of Kennington this Clarke St unit offers an opportunity for any astute Real Estate purchaser to live or invest in. The front unit of a very neat and tidy complex the unit is conveniently located to access the bus network, St Thereses Parish facilities and Lowndes St Doctor surgery, Chemist, Butcher, and Take away
Spacious living/meals area with reverse cycle air conditioning.
Two generous size bedrooms offering built in robes.
Neat kitchens with electric wall oven and hot plate.
Bathroom which provides a full bath and shower recess.
Single lock up garage and storage shed.
Private rear court yard to relax in.
Extremely low maintenance lifestyle.
Quality long term tenant wanting to stay.
